channel.title: Decent PK server?
channel.description: Are there any? Should be 40+ on at a time and medium exp(like 5 days to max).

item.title: Decent PK server?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“total annihilation, post:1, topic:277250”][quote author=vash2341 link=topic=363401.msg2775290#msg2775290 date=1241481831]

In any case, I would consider a “Decent PK server” to be one that is challenging, but not TOO difficult.

I’m appalled that the only kinds of “PKing” servers people want these days, are those in which you can train to flats in an hour, or so, and items are so easy to get that they are worthless. All the fun in PKing is lost because of this, but at least the “noobs” can have their temporary fun.

On servers where the XP rate is low, they complain about how hard it is to train to 99 strength. Who forced them to train to 99 strength, anyway? I just don’t get it…

i agree…im sickend by servers like the current low grade ones that are coming out…flats in an hour and basiclly free rune items and dragon is just shit…i played one server like that and quite after i got banned for getting flats to fast…-.-… i don’t play any private servers atm because of this shit and rsca is mostly down or im to tired to train at 2x…
[/quote]

Hey, do you have MSN?[/quote]

yes i do… its prspulsed@hotmail.com…do i know you are you just being friendly?

Read full topic

item.title: Decent PK server?
item.dc:creator: @mapu mapu
item.description:
@mapu wrote:

[quote=“total annihilation, post:1, topic:277236”][quote author=mapu link=topic=363401.msg2775232#msg2775232 date=1241480459]

I heard Pets’ DarkQuest is being remade into a PK server, which, will the development of the original DQ, the server should be a fuckin’ blast.

DarkQuest PK server??? My dream has finally come true![quote author=mapu link=topic=363401.msg2774143#msg2774143 date=1241416559]
S,tork is the most stable but xp is slow, drop rates are slow.

If you want something where you can pk immediately just look in the ad section on mopar, there’s tons of servers which take 5 seconds to get flats. The problem would be that there’s 10 people online with an economy where you leave your PK loot on the floor and get bored in 10 seconds.

No challenge = no fun.
[/quote]

Same, hence why I play s,tork.
[/quote]

To be honest, I would be playing st0rkpk if it had low-level PKing :).[/quote]

If I were on I would make global announcements but without a mod/admin on all you can do is spam it up in edge or make a post on forums.

Read full topic

item.title: Decent PK server?
item.dc:creator: @Jessekinss Jessekinss
item.description:
@Jessekinss wrote:

[quote=“total annihilation, post:1, topic:277048”][quote author=Jessekinss link=topic=363401.msg2773902#msg2773902 date=1241405328]

reloaded n rscpk are all good servers with good economy

ROFL!

I see nothing funny about that. I don’t know about Reloaded’s economy because I don’t play it, but RSCPK’s economy is doing just fine.

Your statement has little or no value, since you are the owner of RSCPK, and you wouldn’t admit that anything is “wrong” about your server.

THAT statement has no value, as I know everything that is wrong with my server, and the economy is not one of them.

Try again.
[/quote]

Even if you know that something is wrong, you wouldn’t admit it, Jessekins.[/quote]

Again, let me prove you wrong. Click the following link, jackass.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Last post of the page.

Read full topic
